about_the_game:
This support pack is designed for people who want to support the developer of the game Adventure in My Head. It contains content from the game, such as soundtracks, images, as well as some exclusives.

This package contains:
- 8 soundtracks and 2 sounds from the game.
- 25 images from the game.
- 1 secret exclusive.

Thanks for the support!

Thanks for the support!
